list_definition.definition: to give all one’s energies, attention etc to one thing

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I wish you’d concentrate (on what I’m saying).

list_definition.definition: to bring together in one place

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He concentrated his soldiers at the gateway.

list_definition.definition: to make (a liquid) stronger by boiling etc to reduce its volume

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Grapes undergo a process to concentrate the juice after crushing.
